Row.Text: Melee, ranged and anti-cavalry units use only 1 [ICON_Movement] Movement point to pillage. May seize [ICON_Gold] Gold from the target's treasury when pillaging. Pillaging districts whose pillage award is [ICON_Gold] Gold provides additional [ICON_Culture] Culture.
Oasis and Desert Floodplains tiles grant additional +2 Appeal to adjacent tiles. Gain the Abydos Resort improvement when Games and Recreation civic is discovered.

Freshwater Desert tiles receive +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production, additional +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold if adjacent to a Oasis. Gain 500 [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Culture] Culture for every Oasis in your territory when Natural History civic is discovered.

A district unique to Abydos for scientific endeavors. Replaces the Campus district. May build multiple Abydos Branch School in a city, but its buildings can only be built once in a city. This district does not require population, is cheaper to build, cannot be built adjacent to the city center, does not provide [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points, and is not a specialty district. Provides +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production on Freshwater Desert tiles.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Science] Sciense for every adjacent Oasis and +1 [ICON_Science] Science for every 2 adjacent Desert Floodplains.

Abydos unique Atomic era unit that replaces Rocket Artillery. Unlocked by Advanced Ballistics. Has stronger [ICON_Bombard] Bombard Strength, larger [ICON_Range] Range and Sight. Doesn't receive bonuses from Observation Balloons and Drones.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Abydos Resort, unique to Abydos.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture from each Abydos Branch School. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every 2 adjacent Coast or Lake tiles. Provides [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to the tile's Appeal. Provides [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism after researching Flight. Can only be built on Coastal Desert, Coastal Plains, or Coastal Grassland tiles. Minimum Appeal of Breathtaking.
